Parameters: String: The ID of the TV input bound to the current TvRecordingClient.
onDisconnected(java.lang.String).Description: This is called when the connection to the current recording session is lost.

Parameters: int: The error code. Should be one of the followings. TvInputManager#RECORDING_ERROR_UNKNOWN TvInputManager#RECORDING_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_SPACE TvInputManager#RECORDING_ERROR_RESOURCE_BUSY Value is @B_android#media#tv#TvInputManager#RECORDING_ERROR_UNKNOWN_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvInputManager#RECORDING_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_SPACE_E@, or @B_android#media#tv#TvInputManager#RECORDING_ERROR_RESOURCE_BUSY_E@
onError(int).Description: This is called when an issue has occurred. It may be called at any time after the current recording session is created until it is released.

Parameters: Uri: The URI of a channel.
onTuned(android.net.Uri).Description: This is called when the recording session has been tuned to the given channel and is ready to start recording.

Parameters: Uri: The URI for the newly recorded program.
onRecordingStopped(android.net.Uri).Description: This is called when the current recording session has stopped recording and created a new data entry in the @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#RecordedPrograms_E@ table that describes the newly recorded program.

Parameters: String: The ID of the TV input bound to the current TvRecordingClient.
onConnectionFailed(java.lang.String).Description: This is called when an error occurred while establishing a connection to the recording session for the corresponding TV input.

ClassDesc: Callback used to receive various status updates on the @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService#RecordingSession_E@
